channel.title: In-class Activity on GIS, maps + data @ Harvard Library
channel.description: Recent content in In-class Activity on GIS, maps + data @ Harvard Library

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Bit.ly Materials Orientation Map collection info

item.title: Group 1 [Spatial Resolution]
item.description: Cali schools city, state, etc County e x a m p l e How 2 clip Census hierarchies Spatial scale of raster data e.g. Off-gassing from oil and gas wells can be measured with general formulas that estimate particulates over a certain distance. However, the data is often very rough. For example, in Weld County CO, there are about 10,000 wells. Some might say the entire county is a toxic waste dump, but in reality, the impact is only within 100 feet of each well, which is about 1% of the county.

item.title: Group 2 [Portals]
item.description: example w DC food deserts Grocery store locations Healthy corner stores Farmer&rsquo;s markets

item.title: Group 6 [Creating Coordinates]
item.description: Georeferencing Making spreadsheet with coordinates What is a CSV Make headers w lat, lon Upload it somewhere to visualize e.g. cotton seed crushing mills in the south using late 19th century business directories Right-clicking Google Maps to get coordinates Creating vector data with Google MyMaps, geojson.io, or desktop software (QGIS, ArcGIS Pro) Drawing KML
